task.title: How to Make a Breakfast Sandwich
task.shortdesc: A breakfast is both easy to make and filling.

step.cmd: Heat a large non-stick pan over MEDIUM heat and drizzle with 1 tbsp oil.
Place your English muffin on half of the pan cut-side down.
Crack 2 eggs side by side on the other half of the pan and break the yolks with a spatula.
Once eggs are mostly cooked through, sprinkle tops with salt and pepper to taste, 1 tsp fresh chives and half of shredded cheese.
Place toasted English muffins cut-side-down over the eggs and lightly press on the tops with a spatula.
Place ham over half of your sandwich and top with more cheese.
Fold the sandwich together and remove from heat.
